alert.note: Alert for Harris; Talbot (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 2:32PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Talbot and eastern Harris Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 231 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Waverly Hall, or 9 miles southeast of Hamilton, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Pine Mountain, Waverly Hall, Ellerslie, Baughville, Flint Hill and Olive Branch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for west central Georgia.
